footer.text: The Big Brewery is a fictitious website developed for a test given by the company "DTT" (Amsterdam), all rights reserved. The images of the beer cans are from "21stamendment.com", whose employees kindly authorized using them for this project. The public API from where the data is fetched is https://data.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/open-beer-database%40public-us. Note that the fetched data DOES NOT CORRESPOND in any way to the images that only stand here as samples.

home.title: Home
home.text: The Big Brewery gathers the best beers from all around the world. We put a lot of hard work looking for high-quality beverages, and we make them available to you on this website ! Wether you are a beer addict or simply curious, you will surely find your dream beer here !
